Summary: Cluster of Red Yellow Green Blue lights ascending fast
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at intersection of Richard O. and 15 Mile Road in Sterling Heights, Michigan driving North. I saw a cluster of red, green, yellow and blue lights far in the sky above the tree line due North from my position. The lights hovered for about a second or two and then moved at a very high rate of speed and disapeared from my view.
